org.interpss.numeric.sparse.base

Interface ISparseEquation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISparseEqnComplex, ISparseEqnComplexMatrix3x3, ISparseEqnDouble, ISparseEqnInteger, ISparseEqnMatrix2x2, ISparseEqnObject<TAij,TBi>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSparseEquation, SparseEqnComplexImpl, SparseEqnComplexMatrix3x3Impl, SparseEqnDoubleImpl, SparseEqnIntegerImpl, SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl

    public interface ISparseEquation
    Base Sparse Equation for solving sparse matrix problems.

      Check if the matrix is square

      Reset the matrix to zero - set all aii and bi to 0.0 and clear the sparse structure, and release memory if necessary

      Reset all matrix element to zero, preserve the matrix sparse structure.

      • getZeroAii_row

        int getZeroAii_row()
        During the LU process, aii might be zero. An exception will be thrown. This function is for getting zero aii row number for error reporting
        Returns:
        the row number
